Comment: What you get from cheap product sellers like Temu and AlliExpress is competition. If enough people are willing to buy the cheaper products it forces a competition between sellers to attract people with the best pricing. With Temu and AlliExpress out of the retail competition American sellers can raise their prices knowing they don’t have competition and the buyers have no other choice but to buy the (now) more expensive product.
